segments.text: She's a Persian . She has papers and everything . Not like a street dog .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And bugs . They can catch anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have to walk a cat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they use litter boxes or go outside by themselves.Thev ' re so smart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But then you have to change the litter box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's better than picking up dog poop .
segments.speaker: S1
